abstract: Athletes begin moving into Olympic Villiage in Rio de Janeiro as handymen, electricians and plumbers work feverishly to fix infrastructure problems ahead of 2016 Olympics opening ceremony.

headline.print_headline: Nonstop Effort to Stem Flow of Olympic Village Grievances
headline.main: At Athletes’ Village, a Nonstop Effort to Stem Flow of Complaints

snippet: Hundreds of handymen, electricians and plumbers were working round the clock to fix a multitude of infrastructure problems....
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of handymen, electricians and plumbers were working round the clock to fix a multitude of infrastructure problems.
